section.title: A Closer Look at Disambiguation (might be dropped)

warning.title: Follow Restrictions require exact symbols
warning.para: Abstract is not possible: symbol must occur in the production as specified in the follow restriction.
As opposed to reject productions, where abstraction is possible. So, you can abstract over keywords for rejecting them as identifiers, but you cannot abstract over a follow restriction for keywords.

section.title: Avoid and Prefer Productions
section.para: In general, we suggest to use prefer and avoid only as a last resorts. A disavantage of this method is that you do not actually define over which production you actually prefer or avoid the current one. The might lead to surprising non-ambiguities.
